FileFormat.FormatDescription: M2TS is the video stream packet format used on Blu-ray discs. M2TS is similar to fmt/585 - MPEG-2 Transport Stream, but instead features 192 byte packets, with a 4 byte TP_extra_header preceeding each 188 byte transport packet. Filenames usually take the form 'xxxxx.mts' or xxxxx.m2ts' where xxxxx represents a numeric value, beginning with 00000 and incrementing by 1 for each stream.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: offset 4, 0x47 sync byte appearing every 192 bytes from hereon. https://www.google.ch/patents/US7106946
